release_notes: DPI scaling for DarkMsgBox dialogs, high-DPI display support
changelog: IMPROVED: Full DPI scaling support for DarkMsgBox dialogs
FIX: Button dimensions, spacing, and fonts scale with display DPI
FIX: Button no longer obscures text on What's New dialog
FIX: Extended Check All button delay (2 sec) for ProSelect response
FIX: Added Cancel button click to close Export window
FIX: Invoice sync early return preventing GHL upload
FIX: Converted remaining MsgBox to DarkMsgBox for consistency
